timeline.message:
Add Offline Area Selector UI; Delete old Basemap Selector

This change boots the old basemap selector UI in favor of a new Offline
Area selector. There were a couple of bugs and performance issues with
the old selector (namely stemming from reuing the main map instance +
rendering a massive JSON layer on the map) which the new UI (at least
thus far) is free of.

The initial implementation is pretty basic. We can:

- Navigate to the selector from the Offline Areas list.
- Navigate back to the Offline Areas list from the selector.

The selector renders a map and has a download button which will
eventually fire off area downloads but at the moment does nothing.

Remove references to BasemapSelector

The BasemapSelector UI was deleted in f9be9b. We finalize the cleanup
here by removing old references to the selector (which were commented
out anyway).
Fix formatting and license header errors
